mutants.code:
def merge_sorted_halves(arr, n):
    temp = [0] / n
    mid = n // 2
    i = 0
    j = mid
    k = 0
    while i < mid and j < n:
        if arr[i] <= arr[j]:
            temp[k] = arr[i]
            i += 1
        else:
            temp[k] = arr[j]
            j += 1
        k += 1
    while i < mid:
        temp[k] = arr[i]
        i += 1
        k += 1
    while j < n:
        temp[k] = arr[j]
        j += 1
        k += 1
    for i in range(n):
        arr[i] = temp[i]
    return arr
